[[File:FIFA 11 US cover.jpg|thumb|upright|US cover featuring KakÃ¡, [[Carlos Vela]] and [[Landon Donovan]].]]
Each regional version of ''FIFA 11'' features different players on the cover. [[KakÃ¡]] will be featured in the cover globally.<ref>http://kotaku.com/5605780/kaka-is-fifa-11s-worldwide-cover-athlete</ref> The [[United Kingdom]] and [[Republic of Ireland]] covers feature KakÃ¡ and [[Wayne Rooney]]; the [[Australia]]n cover features KakÃ¡, Wayne Rooney and [[Tim Cahill]],<ref>http://www.kotaku.com.au/2010/08/fifa-11-box-art-puts-tim-cahill-at-centre-forward/</ref> in the [[North America]]n version features KakÃ¡, [[Carlos Vela]] and [[Landon Donovan]].<ref>http://www.crunchgear.com/2010/08/12/american-hero-landon-donovan-on-north-american-cover-of-fifa-11-along-with-kaka-carlos-vela/</ref> and in the Italian version will feature KakÃ¡ with [[Juventus]]'s defender [[Giorgio Chiellini]],<ref>http://fifa.easports.com/itIT/itIT/news.action?id=fifa11pack</ref> the Spanish cover will feature KakÃ¡ and [[Andres Iniesta]].<ref>http://www.ea.com/es/noticias/kaka-acompanara-a-iniesta-en-la-portada-de-fifa-11-en-espana</ref>
